backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report defining requirements, associated files, components, and test IDs for the interactive 5‑page birthday experience.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to their high-level summaries for planning and reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind layers and CSS variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script tag loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling page flow, transitions, state, and audio context provider.
frontend/src/components/surprise/audio/M: UI buttons for mute/unmute or initiating audio when autoplay is blocked.
Context provider managing background music playback, mute state, volume, and autoplay handling.
frontend/src/components/surprise/FadeTra: Simple wrapper that applies fade-in or fade-out animation classes based on transition state.
frontend/src/components/surprise/HeartBu: Heart-shaped button component triggering navigation with optional label.
frontend/src/components/surprise/ScreenL: Shared layout component providing page structure with title and configurable background.
frontend/src/components/surprise/screens: Welcome page showing intro text, feeling selection buttons, ambient effects, and a Next heart button.
Renders a memory selection screen with animated ambient visuals and a heart button to proceed.
Provides a text area for entering a birthday wish along with ambient visuals and a next-step button.
Shows a supportive message with glowing ambient effects and a heart button to continue.
Displays the final birthday message with finale animations, shows the user's wish, and offers a replay button.
frontend/src/components/surprise/state/u: Manages multi-page surprise flow state including feelings, memories, and user wish, with next and replay functions.
frontend/src/components/surprise/visuals: Generates floating hearts, stars, and glitter effects based on props and intensity settings.
Creates finale visuals including confetti hearts, floating balloons, glitter rain, and a pastel background.
Displays a cute rabbit sprite in hopping or balloon variant with optional animation.
Renders a tiled sparkle overlay with optional localized area and gold-glow animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating that all state is client-side with no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, pastel theme CSS variables, dark mode variants, utility classes, and multiple decorative animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with ReactDOM, wraps it in React Query and Internet Identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata including design goals, feature list, required images, and architectural notes for a 5‑page birthday website.
